page.title: 10Haunted Stetchworth
page.content: A lot of Ghosts have been seen in Stetchworth.A lady who died in Samantha's bedroom comes back to find her lost daughter.Since Samantha told her that her daughter has moved to Cheveley she has not returned.People who live in the stud next to the churchyard have seen a ghost there. Quite a few people have seen the ghost of an old man in the barn in Alexandra' garden sitting on a chair with a beard and a drink in his hand.In a house at the bottom of the High Street there is a ghost in one of the rooms and if a baby is in it ,it will cry at 9am exactly.Helen was getting a drink downstairs at 1.35am when she saw a lady in a rocking chair with a man beside her.I have a ghost in my bedroom called Mhurfy.It is three white blobs and lots of my friends have seen it.
